channel.title: Let the Games begin! on Blist Multilingual Theme

item.title: Pont Neuf over the Seine, Paris, France
item.description: 图文来源自：bing. copyright: © f11photo/Getty Images Today marks the start of the Summer Olympics in Paris. The City of Light becomes the second city, after London, to host the Summer Olympics for a third time. What makes these Games truly unique is the opening ceremony: Rather than in a stadium, participants will parade along the Seine on a flotilla of boats, passing under the Pont Neuf, pictured here, and cheered by spectators lining both banks.
